prodNameC: 亞培 IMx Sirolimus 檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
IMx Sirolimus Reagent Pack, 100 Tests
1. 1 Bottle (9.7mL) Anti-Sirolimus (Mouse, Monoclonal).
2. 1 Bottle (9.7mL) Sirolimus Alkaline Phosphatase.
3. 1 Bottle (10mL) 4-Methylumbelliferyl Phosphate.

IMx Sirolimus Whole Blood Precipitation Reagent
1 Bottle (35mL) IMx Sirolimus Whole Blood Precipitation Reagent.

IMx Sirolimus MODE 1 Calibrator
3 Bottles (4.5mL each) of IMx Sirolimus MODE 1 Calibrator.

IMx Sirolimus Calibrators 
6 Bottles: IMx Sirlimus Calibrator A (12mL) and Calibrators B through F (4.5 mL each).

IMx Sirolimus Controls
3 Bottles (9.0 mL each) of IMx Sirolimus Controls.

ABBOTT IMx Sirolimus Whole Blood Precipitation Reagent 
1 Bottle (35 mL)
applicantName: 美商亞培股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民生東路三段49號5、6樓及51號5、6樓
efficacy: 定量測試人類全血中之 Sirolimus，並可用於接受 Sirolimus 治療之異體肝臟移植患者之治療。
mdFormat: # 5C91 : REAGENTS, 100 tests ; PRECIPITATION REAGENT, 35 mL ; MODE 1 CALIBRATOR, 4.5 mLx3 ; CALIBRATORS, 12mLX1, 4.5mLX5 ; CONTROLS, 9 mLX3

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
